Entry.JapaneseText: ……前に来た時には、 こんなものはなかった……
一度行った場所でも、 何か見つかる場合が あるという事か……
ラッキー!! 前に来た時には 何もなかったのに！
一度行ったところでも、 調べに行ったら、 新しい発見があるかもネ！
うむ……以前、ここには 何もなかったと思うが……
一度行った場所でも、 新しい発見があるかもしれんな。
まさか、こんなところに…… とても意外な感じね。
一度行った場所でも、こうやって 調べたら何かみつかるかも……？
おう、こんなとこに発見が！ おどろき桃の木だぜ！
前に行った場所でも、 もういっぺん行ってみたら、 何か見つかるかもしれないな！
こんなところに…… そう、こんな事もあるのね。
行った事がある場所でも、 もう一度調べたら、何か見つかる かもしれないって事ね……
初めてのアイテム会話
初めてのアイテム会話
初めてのアイテム会話

Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000000>This must be it. The Royal Sanctuary...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000001>ああ…… ここにゲオルギアスの身体が 眠っているんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000001>Right. Geyorkias' body lies somewhere in here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000002>まったく役立たずどもめ…… 時間稼ぎすらできないとは。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000002>Such disappointment! To think that those imbeciles couldn't even buy me some time.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000003>ジルバ!? なぜおまえがここに!?
<voice:41000004>……おまえたちには 聖獣王の力は渡さぬ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000004>I will not hand over the power of the Sacred Beast King to the likes of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000006>聖獣王の力を手に入れ、 世界を救うのはこの私だ。 だが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000006>The one to acquire Geyorkias' power shall be me alone. And while I do intend to use it for the salvation of this world...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000007>その世界に、 ヒューマはいない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000007>...I don't intend to keep Huma in it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000008>この地上から、愚かで醜い ヒューマという不純物を取り除き、 ガジュマだけの国を作るのだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000008>Huma are a foolish, unsightly impurity that I will purge from this land and in doing so, birth a Gajuma paradise!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000a>選ばれし民、ガジュマの国…… ガジュマだけが生きる理想の国…… カレギア……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000A>A kingdom of the chosen ones... An ideal world in which only the Gajuma live on... Callegea!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000b>その理想の国を、 この私が導くのさ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000B>And I will be the one to pave the way toward this new world!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000c>何が理想の国だ!! ふざけんじゃねえ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000C>There's nothin' “ideal” about that at all! You've lost your damn mind!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000d>おまえたちが何と言おうと、 それが聖獣王の意思……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000D>Protest all you want. My words are the very will of the Sacred Beast King himself...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100000e>私は、聖獣王に 選ばれし者なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100000E>For I have been chosen by him!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000011>バースのラドラス陛下に 対する謀り事は……ジルバ、 すべておまえの仕業だったのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000011>Barrs' plot against His Majesty the King... Zilva, was that all your doing!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000012>フフフ…… もはや隠す必要もあるまい。 おまえの想像どおりさ、<Eugene>。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000012>Hehehe... There's no point in hiding it now. It is just as you suspect, <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000013>ドクター・バースの身体と入れ替わり、 ラドラスに毒を盛ったのも、 おまえを殺そうとしたのもこの私……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000013>I switched bodies with Dr. Barrs and used him to poison King Ladras and make an attempt on your life, as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000014>入れ替わりだと!? まさか、おまえも <Yellow>月のフォルス<White>を……!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000014>You switched bodies!? Then that means...you also have the <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000016>だが、逆に刺されてしまうとは 思わなかったがな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000016>I will admit that I didn't expect to get stabbed in return...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000017>……まあ、結果的に邪魔者が 排除できた事には変わらない……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000017>...But no matter. It doesn't change the fact that I was able to rid myself of a great nuisance.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000018>……あなたが…… あなたがお父さんを……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000018>So it was you... You're the one who killed my...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000019>ハハハハ……感じるだろう？ 聖獣王は間もなく復活する。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000019>Hahaha...you can feel it, can you not!? The Sacred Beast King will soon return to this world...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001b>アガーテを使っての復活は失敗したが、 今度は、今度こそは…… ハハハハ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001B>The resurrection that Agarte played a part in was a failure...but not this time. No, THIS time... Ahahaha!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001c>陛下をたぶらかしたのもおまえか！ おのれジルバ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001C>Then it was YOU who manipulated Her Majesty into performing that ritual! Zilva, you wretched...!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001d>ハハハハ、今頃わかったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001D>Ahahaha! It took you this long to figure that out?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001e>おまえさえいなくなってしまえば、 世間知らずの小娘を操るなど、 他愛もなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001E>With you no longer in the picture, it was absurdly easy to control that naive girl.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100001f>ヒューマの身体が欲しければ ゲオルギアスを甦らせろ、ひいては それが国のためだとささやくだけで、 すべてが面白いように転がった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100001F>All it took was for me to whisper sweet promises of a Huma body that she so coveted, with the added bonus of it being for the sake of the kingdom. Everything fell into place rather nicely!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000020>ジルバ……貴様…… アガーテの気持ちを利用して……！ そのせいでクレアも……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000020>Zilva...you're disgusting. Not only did you take advantage of Agarte's feelings, but you got Claire dragged into this as well!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000021>おまえのような奴に、 ゲオルギアスの力は渡さない!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000021>I'll die before I let Geyorkias' power fall into the hands of someone like you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000022>ハハハハ…… おまえたちの死をもって、 新しい世界の幕開けとしよう じゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000022>Hahahaha! Then your death will mark the beginning of my new world!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000024>シャクだね……シャクだよ!! この私が……私の夢を…… メチャクチャにしやがってぇぇぇッ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000024>It's infuriating...yes, infuriating!! What you've done to my future...my dream! You miserable wretches ruined everything!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000025>やはりあの時、おまえを 殺しておくべきだった…… <Eugene>……<Eugene>…… <Eugene>・ガラルドォォォォッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000025>I knew I should have finished you off when I still had the chance, <Eugene>... <Eugene>...! <Eugene> GALLARDO!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000026>だが……だが、おまえたちも終わりだ!! アハハハハハ…… どうせ、ヒューマは滅ぼされるのだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000026>Make no mistake, however...this is the end for you all as well! Ahahaha! Huma will perish regardless!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000027>おまえたちがよみがえらせる 聖獣王によってな……フフフ…… キャハハハハハハ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000027>And it will be at the hands of the very Sacred Beast King that you have come here to resurrect! Gyahahahaha!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000028>ゲオルギアスは…… オレたちが説得してみせる！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000028>After we revive him... ...We're going to persuade him to our side!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000029>説得だと……ハハハ…… 無駄な事を……フフフフ…… せいぜい悪あがきするがいいさ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000029>Persuade him? ...Hahaha....! A futile endeavor...ahaha...! Go ahead, give it your best shot!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100002b>私の首をとりたいか？ ヒヒヒヒヒ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100002B>You want to finish me off? Ahaha!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100002d>親子愛…… 泣かすじゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100002D>Ah, filial love! It's enough to make one cry...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000031>まだ終わっちゃいない!! 早くゲオルギアスを 復活させるんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000031>This isn't over yet, guys! You need to revive Geyorkias, and fast!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000032>みんな、やるぞ！ オレたちの想いのすべてを ゲオルギアスに伝えるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000032>Let's do this, everyone! Concentrate everything you have and reach out to Geyorkias with your heart!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000033>聖獣王ゲオルギアス…… オレたちに力を貸してくれ！ この災いを止めるために……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000033>Sacred Beast King, Geyorkias... Lend us your strength! Help us stop the catastrophe that affects this world!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000036>大空に邪なる心が満ちる時、 災いの獣、降り立ち、 大地に破滅をもたらす……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000036>When the heavens are filled with the hearts of the wicked, the Beast of Calamity shall descend from above and bring forth destruction to the land...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000039>汝らが我を倒した時に飛び散った 思念は、我のものではない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000039>The scourge that spread throughout the land when I fell to your hands was not of my own origin.
<voice:4100003A>It was a part of Euris himself.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100003c>長年、我がユリスを抑えつけてきた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100003C>Long had I spent suppressing him with all my strength...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100003d>あの時、ユリスの思念は 我が縛めを逃れ、 世界中に飛び散った。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100003D>Upon my defeat, however, Euris' scourge broke free of my restraint and scattered throughout the world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100003e>思念は<Yellow>ヒト<White>の持つ 憎しみやねたみといった感情を 増長させた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100003E>The hatred and jealousy brewing within all <Yellow>mortal<White> hearts had soon thereafter been corrupted, and dramatically amplified.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100003f>思念は汝らによって浄化されたが、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の持つ負の感情は残った。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100003F>Although your actions did indeed purify the world of the scourge, it could not completely quell the wickedness from the hearts of <Yellow>people<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000040>そして、その感情が ユリスを生む……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000040>And so from that wickedness, Euris has been born anew.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000042>我が名をかたり、ジルバを操り、 世界を混乱に導きし……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000042>He who has assumed my identity... He who has corrupted Zilva and led this world into chaos...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000043>そして、今、自ら形をなすは 世界を殺す剣、万物の敵……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000043>And he who now takes the form of a sword that shall pierce the heart of all life, the Enemy of Creation...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000047>なんて事……!! ゲオルギアスですら 歯が立たないなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000047>I can't believe it...even Geyorkias can't put a dent in that thing!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000048>ヒトの負の感情が生み出した…… あれがユリスの力なのか……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000048>The darkness within the hearts of mortals, the source of Euris' power... It's capable of that much destruction!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000049>終わりだ…… 世界は破滅する……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000049>This is indeed the end. The world will soon cease to be.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100004a>ユリスを倒す方法は ないんですか!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100004A>There is truly no way to stop him, then?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100004b>ユリスを生んだ <Yellow>ヒト<White>の負の感情は強大すぎる…… もはや……希望はない……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100004B>The malice that birthed him has grown too strong. Stopping him now is...impossible.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100004c>まだだ…… まだオレたちはやれる……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100004C>No! There must still be something we can do!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100004d>ああ、黙って死ぬなんて まっぴらだぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100004D>Exactly! Like hell I'm just gonna roll over and die!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000057>本当に…… もう何もできないの……？
<voice:41000058>このままユリスに 滅ぼされちゃうなんて イヤだよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000058>Euris...the destruction of the whole world... why did things have to turn out this way!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100005b>ユリスの領域ができたのだ…… やがてそれは世界を呑み込み、 全てを消し去る……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100005B>Euris' realm of destruction has began to take shape. Soon it will extend throughout the world and eradicate everything in its wake.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:4100005d>こうなる前に……<Yellow>ヒト<White>を 滅ぼしておくべきだった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:4100005D>Perhaps I...should have put an end to <Yellow>mortals<White> before an event such as this could come to pass.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000060>無駄だ……我に倒せぬものを…… <Yellow>ヒト<White>の力で何ができる……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000060>A fruitless endeavor. If even I could not stop him... what chance do you have?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000061>うるせぇ!! あきらめたら、 そこで終わりだろうが!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000061>Oh, just shut the HELL up! If we give up now then we're dead for sure, so we might as well try!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000062>……なぜだ…… なぜ汝らは戦おうとする…… 恐れはないのか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000062>Why... Why do you persist? Are you not afraid?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000063>怖いです…… でも信じあえる仲間がいるから、 どんな事にも立ち向かえるんです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000063>Of course we are... But we believe in each other. That is all one needs in the face of adversity.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000064>ねえ、ゲオルギアス、 ボクたちが負けたら、 後はよろしくネ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000064>We're counting on you to finish the job if we fail, okay Geyorkias? Do your best!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000067>……ユリスの領域は広がり続け、 やがて、暗黒が世界を覆い、 破滅を迎える……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000067>If Euris' terrible power is left unhindered, the world will be covered in a blanket of darkness from which there is no hope of survival.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000068>……ユリスを倒さぬ限り、 世界を救う事はできぬ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000068>His defeat is your one and only salvation.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:41000069>……わかった。 ゲオルギアス、見ていてくれ。 オレたちの戦いを……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:41000069>We know. Geyorkias... Watch over us in this battle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
